text:
Oura Health | Senior Backend Developer | Helsinki, Finland | Full-Time | Onsite

Oura is looking for multiple positions in Helsinki, Finland, including

- Senior backend Developer (Python)

- DevOps Engineer

- Data Engineer

- Data Scientist

- Visual UI designer

Oura helps people to enable their full potential by improving their sleep.

Oura ring is an unique product in which design, technology and science meet, and our multidisciplinary team includes designers, developers, data scientists, storytellers and behaviour change experts. We are growing fast and already have passionate users from over 100 countries.

Both the Oura ring and the Oura app have won the Red Dot Design Award.

https://ouraring.com/careers/
